# Pull Request

## 🚀 Summary

> Briefly explain **what** this PR does and **why** it matters.

- Closes #[Issue Number] (if applicable)
- Describe the feature, bugfix, or enhancement
- Link to any relevant discussions or issues

---

## ✅ Checklist

Please check all that apply:

- [ ] My code follows the project's coding standards
- [ ] I’ve tested my changes locally
- [ ] I’ve added/updated documentation (if applicable)
- [ ] I’ve added/updated tests (if applicable)
- [ ] I’ve run the test suite and it passes

---

## 📸 Screenshots / Output Logs (if UI or CLI related)

> Add screenshots or terminal output here if needed

---

## 🧠 Notes to Reviewer

> Anything the reviewer should know? Context? Weird edge cases? Future improvements?

---

## 🔁 How to Test

> Steps for the reviewer to test this PR. Keep it simple.

1. Pull the branch
2. Run `phpunit` or applicable test command
3. Hit endpoint X or test class Y
4. Expect Z

---

## 🛠️ Breaking Changes?

- [ ] Yes (describe below)
- [ ] No

> If yes, explain what breaks and what needs to be updated (e.g., configs, environment variables, DB schema)
